When you were sitting on the sidelines , what positives did you see with your team ?, 当你坐在场边 , 你从球队中看到什么积极因素了吗?

jx.jx_en_mean: in (or from) a position where one is observing a situation but is unable or unwilling to be directly involved in it

entry.def: A sideline is something that you do in addition to your main job in order to earn extra money.

example.ex: It was quite a lucrative sideline...
Mr. Means sold computer disks as a sideline.
example.tran: 米恩斯先生以卖计算机硬盘作为副业。

entry.def: The sidelines are the lines marking the long sides of the playing area, for example on a football field or tennis court.
If you are on the sidelines in a situation, you do not influence events at all, either because you have chosen not to be involved, or because other people have not involved you.

example.ex: France no longer wants to be left on the sidelines when critical decisions are taken...
example.tran: 在作出关键决定时，法国不想再被撇在一边了。

example.ex: He has watched from the sidelines the great developments unrolling in Eastern Europe...
example.tran: 他一直在一旁关注东欧相继取得的重大进展。

entry.tran: 把…排除在外;使靠边;不重视
entry.def: If someone or something is sidelined, they are made to seem unimportant and not included in what people are doing.

example.ex: He was under pressure to resign and was about to be sidelined...
example.tran: 他承受着被迫辞职的压力，很快就要被排挤出去了。

example.ex: What they fear is that environment policy will be sidelined until it is too late.
example.tran: 他们所担忧的是环境政策不能得到及时的重视。

entry.tran: 使(运动员)下场;使退出比赛
entry.def: In sports, if a player is sidelined, he or she is prevented from playing for a period of time, for example because of an injury.

example.ex: Mercer will have his jaw wired up tomorrow and will be sidelined for six to eight weeks.
example.tran: 默瑟明天要进行下颌骨固定手术，将离开赛场 6至8 个星期。

means.word_mean: 1. a line that marks the side boundary of a playing field

auth_sentence.content: He found a seam running diagonally toward the sideline.
auth_sentence.res_content: He found a seam running diagonally toward the sideline.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He found a seam running diagonally toward the sideline.

auth_sentence.content: Leigh Nicholson is an academic with a sideline in art.
auth_sentence.res_content: Leigh Nicholson is an academic with a sideline in art.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Leigh Nicholson is an academic with a sideline in art.

auth_sentence.content: Smuggling to prisoners was the guards' sideline.
auth_sentence.res_content: Smuggling to prisoners was the guards' sideline.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Smuggling to prisoners was the guards' sideline.

sentences.en: He decided to turn his hobby into a lucrative sideline.
sentences.cn: 他决定把自己的爱好变成赚钱的副业。

sentences.en: Cider making was a sideline for many farmers.
sentences.cn: 酿造苹果酒是很多农民的一项副业。

sentences.en: Farm and sideline products of the peasants are purchased by the state at reasonable prices.
sentences.cn: 农民的农副产品由国家按合理价格收购。
